attributes.title: Awful App
attributes.review: This app doesn’t even deserve a single star!! It was an absolutely horrible app; I actually barfed by how much I was repulsed by this app. Not only does it endorse something awful, but it is just completely idiotic!

attributes.title: Laggy and sketchy
attributes.review: The app lagged like crazy and it had me put in my number. I did, and then I got calls and texts at least every hour. They must’ve sold my number to scammers.

attributes.title: Horrid, Absolutely Horrid
attributes.review: Now I have been in a chronic sleep chamber for the past 10,000 years and when I woke up to find that this app exist I immediately had to investigate. To my disgust, I found some person named tRumP and I just🥴🤢 but yeah.....BLM

attributes.title: mean trump puff🧚🏾‍♀️😡😤✨
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and all of a sudden anonymous walks in my door and says that trump said that my martha my average dog didn’t go ruff ruff rrrr when she ate some alphabet soup well😡 i got ✨m a d✨. so i decided to delete the app because trump does not like martha😤✨🧚🏾‍♀️🙈😝

attributes.title: Inappropriate
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to show support for Trump but as soon as I opened the app, my phone glitched out and every time I tried to exit out, trumps nudes kept popping up! I am scarred for life because of this deeply inappropriate app.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app trying to keep up with trump because his life is just so crazy 😜 but then an entire swat team raided my house with the information the stole from me on the app 😡😡😡 I think they stole my cat!!!!

attributes.title: sent my mother to the hospital ❤️
attributes.review: as soon as my mother opened the app, she came face to face with a horrific orange monster with small hands and thinly strung hair. it scared the living sht out of her and sent her into cardiac arrest 🧚🏼‍♀️ she’s currently recovering at the hospital and has night terrors from Trump’s face ✨✨✨

attributes.title: The app is broken
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for political reasons but it kept showing pictures of this weird looking cheeto 😞hope they fix that in the next update😍

attributes.title: this app is amazing
attributes.review: i always wanted to support my president Cheeto ball ✨with this app i can register and share points with my other white supremacists. 🥺when i open the app, its so convenient to see a wrinkly old white supremacist💖

attributes.title: save barron trump 2020 🇺🇸
attributes.review: this is the worst app on the app store. i opened the app and immediately saw pictures of trump spray tanning. my sister was sitting right next to me and saw the picture and won't stop nagging me about it. whatever you do DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
